 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲגָלָה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==cart== (from ***rolling*** of wheels; Late Hebrew ***id.***; Phoenician (Punic) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עגלת‎</span> (?) [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>336</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֲגַלְתָּא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Semitic loan-word in Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***¹gar***</u></abbr><span class="bdbLangGreek">***θ***</span><abbr title="transliteration"><u>***a***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Bondi|Bondi]]<sup>38</sup>, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***±agolt***</u></abbr> Erman<sup>Egypt, 491</sup>; compare also [[BDB#Wilkinson|Wilkinson]]<sup>Anc.Egypt.(1878),i.223-241, especially 235, also 249</sup> (illustrated vehicles drawn by cattle, compare [[1Sam.6.7|1Sam 6:7]]; [[Num.7.3|Num 7:3]])); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[1Sam.6.7|1Sam 6:7]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶגְלָתוֺ‎</span> [[Isa.28.28|Isa 28:28]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲגָלוֺת‎</span> [[Gen.45.19|Gen 45:19]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶגְלֹת‎</span> [[Num.7.3|Num 7:3]] — ***cart***, used for transporting persons and things [[Gen.45.19|Gen 45:19]]; [[Gen.45.21|Gen 45:21]]; [[Gen.45.27|Gen 45:27]]; [[Gen.46.5|Gen 46:5]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Sam.6.7|1Sam 6:7]] (twice in verse); [[1Sam.6.8|1Sam 6:8]]; [[1Sam.6.10|1Sam 6:10]]; [[1Sam.6.11|1Sam 6:11]]; [[1Sam.6.14|1Sam 6:14]] (twice in verse), [[2Sam.6.3|2Sam 6:3]] (twice in verse) = [[1Chr.13.7|1Chr 13:7]] (twice in verse); [[Num.7.3|Num 7:3]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> ***covered carts***), v[[Num.7.3|Num 7:3]] v[[Num.7.6|Num 7:6]] v[[Num.7.7|Num 7:7]] v[[Num.7.8|Num 7:8]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); in simile [[Amos.2.13|Amos 2:13]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲבוֺת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַע‎</span> [[Isa.5.18|Isa 5:18]] ***cart-rope***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוֺפַן ע‎</span> [[Isa.28.27|Isa 28:27]] of (***threshing***-) ***wagon*** (compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>Amos. p. 228</sup>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּלְגַּל ע‎</span> v[[Isa.28.28|Isa 28:28]] ***id.***; — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> = ***war-chariots*** only [[Ps.46.10|Ps 46:10]] ([[BDB#Du|Du]] ***transport-wagons***).
